name: Cyber Link Dragoon Proto
text: This card can be Link Summoned by using 2 Omni monsters with different names as Link materials. (Once per turn): You can discard 1 card; target 1 monster on the field or in either player’s GY; banish it. If a monster is banished, this card gains ATK equal to the banished monster’s original ATK until the end of the turn. (Once per turn): If this card is Link Summoned using Omni monsters as materials, you can add 1 Omni card from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use this effect if "Cyber Link Dragoon Proto" has Omni monsters as its Link materials. (Quick Effect): During your opponent's turn, you can banish 1 Omni monster from your GY; this card gains 1000 ATK until the end of the turn. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect, you can Special Summon 1 Omni monster from your GY, and if you do, you can equip "Cyber Link Dragoon Proto" to that monster as an Equip Spell that gives that monster 500 ATK.
